author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day trial + 20% off the premium subscription! This video was sponsored by Brilliant. 
Thanks a lot for the support!

Your 12,025 Human Era Calendar is waiting! Don’t miss your chance to own a special piece of our shared history and an essential part of kurzgesagt: https://shop.kgs.link/HumanEra25

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-gravastars/

Gravastars could change how we think about the universe. These cosmic objects solve black holes’ biggest problems without breaking physics. From their ultra-thin shell to their energy-filled core, gravastars are both elegant and terrifying. But what exactly are they?
